nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping

Class HitPropertyWordLeft

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping.HitProperty
      • nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping.HitPropertyWordLeft
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<java.lang.Object>

    public class HitPropertyWordLeft
extends HitProperty
    A hit property for grouping on the context of the hit. Requires HitConcordances as input (so we have the hit text available).

      • compare

        public int compare(java.lang.Object oa,
          java.lang.Object ob)
        Description copied from class: HitProperty
        Compares two hits on this property. Note that we use Object as the type instead of Hit to save on run-time type checking. We know (slash hope :-) that this method is only ever called to compare Hits.
        Specified by:
        compare in interface java.util.Comparator<java.lang.Object>
        Specified by:
        compare in class HitProperty
        Parameters:
        oa - first hit
        ob - second hit
        Returns:
        0 if equal, negative if a < b, positive if a > b.
